channel.title: Account Recovery
channel.description: Is there an area where I can go to recover my mopar account? I just remembered I have an old account I never used. Where can I go to recover it? I forgot the email that went to it... I've had sooo many emails. (IDK WHY!) Help? The username is flint.

item.title: Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:4, topic:422406”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=525074.msg3822113#msg3822113 date=1321885873]

I’ve had sooo many emails.

I’ve had like 1000, idk why so many lawlz, anyways gl to u ^.^
[/quote]
Wet Dreamss, just leave this site, you are a horrible person.[/quote]
FINALLY SOMEONE SAYS IT!

Read full topic

item.title: Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Usually, you do require the email in order to recover an account. Especially in this case, whereas tracking your ip I don’t find “flint” in the same range, thus you can’t really prove that was your account. Under most instances, we’d probably be alright with you just using this current account, but please contact an administrator for more help. MoparScape Moderators and Global Moderators will not be able to help you as they do not have access to that sort of thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:

[quote=“Flintstone, post:1, topic:422406”]Is there an area where I can go to recover my mopar account? I just remembered I have an old account I never used. Where can I go to recover it? I forgot the email that went to it… I’ve had sooo many emails. (IDK WHY!)
Help?
The username is flint.[/quote]
Yep, just ask an admin or a mod the email user, and from there you should be able to do this rest

Read full topic
